contentTypes.name: Accordion
contentTypes.description: [Component] Container for Storefront UI Accordion Items.

contentTypes.name: Banner
contentTypes.description: [Component] A single Storefront UI Banner.

contentTypes.name: Page
contentTypes.description: [Container] Dynamic container for creating pages featuring layout and page components.

validations.message: The page url needs to start with a forward slash (/).

contentTypes.name: Card
contentTypes.description: [Component] A single Storefront UI Card.

contentTypes.name: Editorial
contentTypes.description: [Component] Takes the raw HTML generated by the Rich Text editor and renders it on a page.

validations.message: Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, and subscript marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, and inline entry nodes are allowed

contentTypes.name: Accordion Item
contentTypes.description: [Field Group] A single Storefront UI Accordion Item. To be used with Accordion Content Type only.

contentTypes.name: Gallery
contentTypes.description: [Component] A single Storefront UI Gallery.

contentTypes.name: Scrollable
contentTypes.description: [Component] A single Storefront UI Scollable.

contentTypes.name: Grid
contentTypes.description: [Component] Powerful component which takes in other page components (e.g. Banner) and displays them in a structured grid layout.

contentTypes.name: Hero
contentTypes.description: [Component] A single Storefront UI Hero.

contentTypes.name: Newsletter Box
contentTypes.description: [Component] A single Storefront UI Newsletter Box.

contentTypes.name: Styles - screen resolutions
contentTypes.description: [Field Group] Screen resolution to apply the styles for. To be used with the Styles Content Type only.

contentTypes.name: Styles
contentTypes.description: [Field Group] Allows customizing certain CSS properties of your components.

contentTypes.name: Styles - margins
contentTypes.description: [Field Group] CSS margin properties to apply for a component. To be used with the Styles Content Type only.

roles.name: Editor
roles.description: Allows editing, publishing and archiving of content

roles.name: Freelancer
roles.description: Allows only editing of content they created themselves

roles.name: Translator
roles.description: Allows editing of localized fields in the specified language
